text: If strip="true" on the scrape tag and the resulting scrape has no HTML tags that it needs to strip out, the scrape tag does not spit out the result. For example, if the scrape result is supposed to be: Hello this is a scrape result the scrape tag will not display it if the strip attribute is set to true. It works when there is an HTML tag in the scrape like: Hello this is a scrape result. but without HTML tags, it does not work.
creator: aberman@icfconsulting.com
